00019 void PhyLayerUWBIR::initialize(int stage) {
00020   BasePhyLayer::initialize(stage);
00021   if (stage == 0) {
00022     numActivities = hasPar("numActivities") ? par("numActivities").longValue() : 6;
00023 
00024     /* parameters belong to the NIC, not just phy layer
00025      *
00026      * if/when variable transmit power is supported, txCurrent
00027      * should be specified as an xml table of available transmit
00028      * power levels and corresponding txCurrent */
00029     sleepCurrent = rxCurrent = decodingCurrentDelta = txCurrent = 0;
00030     setupRxCurrent = setupTxCurrent = rxTxCurrent = txRxCurrent = 0;
00031     sleepCurrent = getNic()->par( "sleepCurrent" );
00032     rxCurrent = getNic()->par( "rxCurrent" );
00033 //    decodingCurrentDelta = getNic()->par( "decodingCurrentDelta" );
00034     txCurrent = getNic()->par( "txCurrent" );
00035     setupRxCurrent = getNic()->par( "setupRxCurrent" );
00036     setupTxCurrent = getNic()->par( "setupTxCurrent" );
00037     rxTxCurrent = getNic()->par( "rxTxCurrent" );
00038     txRxCurrent = getNic()->par( "txRxCurrent" );
00039     syncCurrent = getNic()->par( "syncCurrent" ); // assume instantaneous transitions between rx and sync
00040     uwbradio    = dynamic_cast<RadioUWBIR*>(radio);
00041   } else if (stage == 1) {
00042     registerWithBattery("physical layer", numActivities);
00043     setRadioCurrent(radio->getCurrentState());
00044   }
00045 
00046 }

00049 Radio* PhyLayerUWBIR::initializeRadio() const {
00050   int initialRadioState = par("initialRadioState"); //readPar("initalRadioState", (int) RadioUWBIR::SYNC);
00051   double radioMinAtt = readPar("radioMinAtt", 1.0);
00052   double radioMaxAtt = readPar("radioMaxAtt", 0.0);
00053 
00054   RadioUWBIR* uwbradio = RadioUWBIR::createNewUWBIRRadio(recordStats, initialRadioState, radioMinAtt, radioMaxAtt);
00055 
00056   //  - switch times to TX
00057   //simtime_t rxToTX = readPar("timeRXToTX", 0.0);
00058   //simtime_t sleepToTX = readPar("timeSleepToTX", 0.0);
00059 
00060   // Radio timers
00061   // From Sleep mode
00062   uwbradio->setSwitchTime(RadioUWBIR::SLEEP, RadioUWBIR::RX, par("timeSleepToRX").doubleValue());
00063   uwbradio->setSwitchTime(RadioUWBIR::SLEEP, RadioUWBIR::TX, par("timeSleepToTX").doubleValue());
00064   uwbradio->setSwitchTime(RadioUWBIR::SLEEP, RadioUWBIR::SLEEP, 0);
00065 
00066   // From TX mode
00067   uwbradio->setSwitchTime(RadioUWBIR::TX, RadioUWBIR::SYNC, par("timeTXToRX").doubleValue());
00068   uwbradio->setSwitchTime(RadioUWBIR::TX, RadioUWBIR::RX, par("timeTXToRX").doubleValue());
00069 
00070   // From RX mode
00071   uwbradio->setSwitchTime(RadioUWBIR::RX, RadioUWBIR::TX, par("timeRXToTX").doubleValue());
00072   uwbradio->setSwitchTime(RadioUWBIR::RX, RadioUWBIR::SYNC, 0.000000001);
00073   uwbradio->setSwitchTime(RadioUWBIR::SYNC, RadioUWBIR::TX, par("timeRXToTX").doubleValue());
00074 
00075   // From SYNC mode
00076   uwbradio->setSwitchTime(RadioUWBIR::SYNC, RadioUWBIR::RX, 0.000000001);
00077 
00078   return uwbradio;
00079 }

00081 AnalogueModel* PhyLayerUWBIR::getAnalogueModelFromName(std::string name, ParameterMap& params) const {
00082   if (name == "UWBIRStochasticPathlossModel")
00083     return createUWBIRStochasticPathlossModel(params);
00084 
00085   if (name == "UWBIRIEEE802154APathlossModel")
00086     return createUWBIRIEEE802154APathlossModel(params);
00087 
00088   return BasePhyLayer::getAnalogueModelFromName(name, params);
00089 }
00090 
00091 /*
00092  *Returns an AnalogueModel object which will be stored in the
00093  * analogueModels list. All AnalogueModel objects are successively applied
00094  * to any signal at the beginning of its reception, and their outputs
00095  * (attenuations objects) are then associated to the incoming signal object.
00096  **/
00097 AnalogueModel* PhyLayerUWBIR::createUWBIRStochasticPathlossModel(ParameterMap & params) const {
00098   //get the pathloss exponent parameter from the config
00099   ParameterMap::iterator it = params.find("PL0");
00100   double PL0 = it->second.doubleValue();
00101   it = params.find("mu_gamma");
00102   if (it == params.end()) {
00103     error(
00104         "Could not find required double parameter <mu_gamma> in the Ghassemzadeh channel xml description file.");
00105   }
00106   double mu_gamma = it->second.doubleValue();
00107   it = params.find("sigma_gamma");
00108   if (it == params.end()) {
00109     error(
00110         "Could not find required double parameter <sigma_gamma> in the Ghassemzadeh channel xml description file.");
00111   }
00112   double sigma_gamma = it->second.doubleValue();
00113   it = params.find("mu_sigma");
00114   if (it == params.end()) {
00115     error(
00116         "Could not find required double parameter <mu_sigma> in the Ghassemzadeh channel xml description file.");
00117   }
00118   double mu_sigma = it->second.doubleValue();
00119   it = params.find("sigma_sigma");
00120   if (it == params.end()) {
00121     error(
00122         "Could not find required double parameter <sigma_sigma> in the Ghassemzadeh channel xml description file.");
00123   }
00124   double sigma_sigma = it->second.doubleValue();
00125 
00126   it = params.find("isEnabled");
00127   if (it == params.end()) {
00128     error(
00129         "Could not find required bool parameter <isEnabled> in the Ghassemzadeh channel xml description file.");
00130   }
00131   bool isEnabled = it->second.boolValue();
00132 
00133   bool shadowing = true;
00134   it = params.find("shadowing");
00135   if (it != params.end()) {
00136     shadowing = it->second.boolValue();
00137   }
00138 
00139   return new UWBIRStochasticPathlossModel(PL0, mu_gamma, sigma_gamma,
00140       mu_sigma, sigma_sigma, isEnabled, shadowing);
00141 }

00143 AnalogueModel* PhyLayerUWBIR::createUWBIRIEEE802154APathlossModel(ParameterMap & params) const {
00144   int CM;
00145   ParameterMap::iterator it = params.find("CM");
00146   if (it == params.end()) {
00147     error(
00148         "Could not find required integer parameter <CM> (Channel Model) in the IEEE 802.15.4A channel xml description file.");
00149   }
00150   CM = int(it->second.longValue());
00151 
00152   double threshold;
00153   it = params.find("Threshold");
00154   if (it == params.end()) {
00155     error("Could not find required double parameter <Threshold> in the IEEE 802.15.4A channel xml description file.");
00156   }
00157   threshold = it->second.doubleValue();
00158 
00159   bool shadowing = false;
00160   it = params.find("shadowing");
00161   if (it != params.end()) {
00162     shadowing = it->second.boolValue();
00163   }
00164 
00165   return new UWBIRIEEE802154APathlossModel(CM, threshold, shadowing);
00166 }

00168 Decider* PhyLayerUWBIR::getDeciderFromName(std::string name, ParameterMap& params) {
00169   double syncThreshold;
00170   bool stats;
00171   bool trace;
00172   bool syncAlwaysSucceeds;
00173   ParameterMap::iterator it;
00174 
00175   protocolId = IEEE_802154_UWB;
00176 
00177   it = params.find("syncThreshold");
00178   if (it == params.end()) {
00179     error(
00180         "Could not find required double parameter <syncThreshold> in the decider xml configuration file.");
00181   }
00182   syncThreshold = it->second.doubleValue();
00183 
00184   it = params.find("stats");
00185   if (it == params.end()) {
00186     error(
00187         "Could not find required boolean parameter <stats> in the decider xml configuration file.");
00188   }
00189   stats = it->second.boolValue();
00190 
00191   it = params.find("trace");
00192   if (it == params.end()) {
00193     error(
00194         "Could not find required boolean parameter <trace> in the decider xml configuration file.");
00195   }
00196   trace = it->second.boolValue();
00197 
00198   it = params.find("syncAlwaysSucceeds");
00199   if (it == params.end()) {
00200     error(
00201         "Could not find required boolean parameter <syncAlwaysSucceeds> in the decider xml configuration file.");
00202   }
00203   syncAlwaysSucceeds = it->second.boolValue();
00204 
00205   bool alwaysFailOnDataInterference;
00206   it = params.find("alwaysFailOnDataInterference");
00207   if (it == params.end()) {
00208     alwaysFailOnDataInterference = false;
00209   } else {
00210     alwaysFailOnDataInterference = it->second.boolValue();
00211   }
00212 
00213   if (name == "DeciderUWBIREDSyncOnAddress") {
00214     LAddress::L2Type addr;
00215     it = params.find("addr");
00216     if (it == params.end()) {
00217       error(
00218           "Could not find required int parameter <addr> in the decider xml configuration file.");
00219     }
00220     addr = LAddress::L2Type(it->second.longValue());
00221     uwbdecider = new DeciderUWBIREDSyncOnAddress(this, this, syncThreshold,
00222         syncAlwaysSucceeds, stats, trace, addr, alwaysFailOnDataInterference);
00223   }
00224 
00225   if (name == "DeciderUWBIREDSync") {
00226     double tmin;
00227     it = params.find("syncMinDuration");
00228     if (it == params.end()) {
00229       error(
00230           "Could not find required double parameter <syncMinDuration> in the decider xml configuration file.");
00231     }
00232     tmin = it->second.doubleValue();
00233     uwbdecider = new DeciderUWBIREDSync(this, this, syncThreshold, syncAlwaysSucceeds, stats, trace, tmin, alwaysFailOnDataInterference);
00234   }
00235 
00236   if (name=="DeciderUWBIRED") {
00237       uwbdecider = new DeciderUWBIRED(this, this, syncThreshold, syncAlwaysSucceeds, stats, trace, alwaysFailOnDataInterference);
00238   }
00239   return uwbdecider;
00240 }

00242 void PhyLayerUWBIR::handleHostState(const HostState& state) {
00243   if (state.get() != HostState::ACTIVE && radio->getCurrentState() != Radio::SLEEP) {
00244     coreEV<< "host is no longer in active state (maybe FAILED, SLEEP, OFF or BROKEN), force into sleep state!" << endl;
00245     setRadioState(Radio::SLEEP);
00246     // it would be good to create a radioState OFF, as well
00247   }
00248 }

00250 void PhyLayerUWBIR::finishRadioSwitching() {
00251   BasePhyLayer::finishRadioSwitching();
00252 
00253   setRadioCurrent(radio->getCurrentState());
00254 }
00255 
00256 void PhyLayerUWBIR::setSwitchingCurrent(int from, int to) {
00257   int act = SWITCHING_ACCT;
00258   double current = 0;
00259 
00260   switch(from) {
00261   case RadioUWBIR::SYNC:
00262   case Radio::RX:
00263     switch(to) {
00264     case Radio::SLEEP:
00265       current = rxCurrent;
00266       break;
00267     case Radio::TX:
00268       current = rxTxCurrent;
00269       break;
00270       // ! transitions between rx and sync should be immediate
00271     default:
00272       opp_error("Unknown radio switch! From RX to %d", to);
00273       break;
00274     }
00275     break;
00276 
00277   case Radio::TX:
00278     switch(to) {
00279     case Radio::SLEEP:
00280       current = txCurrent;
00281       break;
00282     case Radio::RX:
00283       current = txRxCurrent;
00284       break;
00285     default:
00286       opp_error("Unknown radio switch! From TX to %d", to);
00287       break;
00288     }
00289     break;
00290 
00291   case Radio::SLEEP:
00292     switch(to) {
00293     case Radio::TX:
00294       current = setupTxCurrent;
00295       break;
00296     case Radio::RX:
00297       current = setupRxCurrent;
00298       break;
00299     default:
00300       opp_error("Unknown radio switch! From SLEEP to %d", to);
00301       break;
00302     }
00303     break;
00304 
00305   default:
00306     opp_error("Unknown radio state: %d", from);
00307     break;
00308   }
00309 
00310   BatteryAccess::drawCurrent(current, act);
00311 }
00312 
00313 void PhyLayerUWBIR::setRadioCurrent(int rs) {
00314   switch(rs) {
00315   case RadioUWBIR::RX:
00316     BatteryAccess::drawCurrent(rxCurrent, RX_ACCT);
00317     break;
00318   case RadioUWBIR::TX:
00319     BatteryAccess::drawCurrent(txCurrent, TX_ACCT);
00320     break;
00321   case RadioUWBIR::SLEEP:
00322     BatteryAccess::drawCurrent(sleepCurrent, SLEEP_ACCT);
00323     break;
00324   case RadioUWBIR::SYNC:
00325     BatteryAccess::drawCurrent(syncCurrent, SYNC_ACCT);
00326     break;
00327   default:
00328     break;
00329   }
00330 }
00331 
00332 /*
00333 simtime_t PhyLayerUWBIR::setRadioState(int rs) {
00334   if(_radio->getCurrentState()==RadioUWBIR::RX && rs != RadioUWBIR::RX && rs!= RadioUWBIR::SYNC) {
00335     uwbdecider->cancelReception();
00336   }
00337   BasePhyLayer::setRadioState(rs);
00338 }
00339 */
00340 simtime_t PhyLayerUWBIR::setRadioState(int rs) {
00341   int prevState = radio->getCurrentState();
00342 
00343   if(rs==Radio::RX) {
00344     coreEV << "this is my breakpoint" << endl;
00345   }
00346   if(radio->getCurrentState()==RadioUWBIR::RX && rs != RadioUWBIR::RX && rs!= RadioUWBIR::SYNC) {
00347     uwbdecider->cancelReception();
00348   }
00349 
00350   simtime_t endSwitch = BasePhyLayer::setRadioState(rs);
00351 
00352   if(endSwitch >= 0) {
00353     if(radio->getCurrentState() == Radio::SWITCHING) {
00354             setSwitchingCurrent(prevState, rs);
00355     } else {
00356       setRadioCurrent(radio->getCurrentState());
00357     }
00358   }
00359 
00360   return endSwitch;
00361 }
00362 
00363 AirFrame *PhyLayerUWBIR::encapsMsg(cPacket *macPkt)
00364 {
00365   // the cMessage passed must be a MacPacket... but no cast needed here
00366   // MacPkt* pkt = static_cast<MacPkt*>(msg);
00367 
00368   // ...and must always have a ControlInfo attached (contains Signal)
00369   cObject* ctrlInfo = macPkt->removeControlInfo();
00370   assert(ctrlInfo);
00371 
00372   // create the new AirFrame
00373   AirFrameUWBIR* frame = new AirFrameUWBIR("airframe", AIR_FRAME);
00374 
00375   // Retrieve the pointer to the Signal-instance from the ControlInfo-instance.
00376   // We are now the new owner of this instance.
00377   Signal* s = MacToUWBIRPhyControlInfo::getSignalFromControlInfo(ctrlInfo);
00378   // make sure we really obtained a pointer to an instance
00379   assert(s);
00380 
00381   // set the members
00382   assert(s->getDuration() > 0);
00383   frame->setDuration(s->getDuration());
00384   // copy the signal into the AirFrame
00385   frame->setSignal(*s);
00386   //set priority of AirFrames above the normal priority to ensure
00387   //channel consistency (before any thing else happens at a time
00388   //point t make sure that the channel has removed every AirFrame
00389   //ended at t and added every AirFrame started at t)
00390   frame->setSchedulingPriority(airFramePriority);
00391   frame->setProtocolId(myProtocolId());
00392   frame->setBitLength(headerLength);
00393   frame->setId(world->getUniqueAirFrameId());
00394   frame->setChannel(radio->getCurrentChannel());
00395   frame->setCfg(MacToUWBIRPhyControlInfo::getConfigFromControlInfo(ctrlInfo));
00396 
00397   // pointer and Signal not needed anymore
00398   delete s;
00399   s = 0;
00400 
00401   // delete the Control info
00402   delete ctrlInfo;
00403   ctrlInfo = 0;
00404 
00405   frame->encapsulate(macPkt);
00406 
00407   // --- from here on, the AirFrame is the owner of the MacPacket ---
00408   macPkt = 0;
00409   coreEV <<"AirFrame encapsulated, length: " << frame->getBitLength() << "\n";
00410 
00411   return frame;
00412 }
